meta.description: Long Story Short with Dr. Been features one of the internet’s most popular medical educators and explores long COVID treatment.

title: Kid's Corner
cleaned_text:
Kid’s Corner with Dr. Liz is a new resource that covers pediatric health issues with Dr. Elizabeth Mumper.

Dr. Mumper has been a practicing pediatrician for several decades, and is the originator of the I-CARE: For Kids protocol, which helps parents understand how to prevent their children from getting COVID-19 and what to do if they get sick. She is an expert at breaking down complex topics and providing practical solutions, which includes health promotion information for children.

This video series will explore emerging topics and research regarding pediatrics in the COVID era, with a focus on topics relevant to both parents and other healthcare providers.
